annonsrubrik: Are you ready for the journey? Which is electric by the way...
annonstext:
If you are passionate about people and feel excited about being part of transforming a whole industry, then keep reading. Polestar are looking for an new HR Business Partner! This job gives you the unique opportunity to drive the people experience in a newly established global tech company– you will shape our story from the very first chapter.

OM TJÄNSTEN 
Your main responsibility as HRBP will be to support managers with recruitment, salary settings, negotiations, team development, coaching and the implementation of HR processes and tools. The work-place will be in the Polestar Cube, Torslanda - a top-class working environment.

You are offered  

* A possibility to be a part of an international organization that works with innovative products to improve the environment. 
* Be a part of an flat organization with a Go-Get-Attitude and as HR they act as a strong team to get things done to enable the business to be successful 
* A role where you will have close collaboration with colleagues in a high paced organization that emphasizes development.

The assignment is full time and you will start working as a Consultant for Academic Work. As Consultant at Academic Work, you are offered a great opportunity to grow as a professional, extend your network and establish valuable contacts for the future. Read more about our offer.

ARBETSUPPGIFTER 
* Coach and provide advice to line management on people matters as the people specialists 

* Proactively develop, support and monitor actions linked to improved organizational health and increased performance  
* Collaborate within HR to secure innovative HR solutions and efficiency in HR services.

VI SÖKER DIG SOM 
* University degree in relevant fields (i.e. HR Mgmt./Psychology/Behavioural Science) or equivalent expertise

* At least 3 years HR working experience
* Broad and comprehensive understanding of HR processes
* Ability to prioritize and take tough decisions in the interest of the organization and do this in a transparent and customer-oriented way
* Ability to create efficient working relationships for the team and for oneself 

Meritorious:

* Specific EMEA experience is beneficial

We are looking for someone with strong leadership skills with high personal energy and integrity. We think you have a very strong customer orientation with a creative mind set to solve problems supplemented by a hands-on attitude. We also see that analytical skills and capability to make good analysis, judgements and take actions is important for this role.

Other information  

* Start: Immediate
* Work extent: Full time
* Location: Torslanda
* Contact information: This recruitment process is conducted by Academic Work. It is a request from us that all questions regarding the position is handled by
Academic Work. 

Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.

INFORMATION OM FÖRETAGET 
Read more about Polestar by following the link.
